title: Can't log into league!
body: I upgraded my Mac to the new Macbook Sierra. I downloaded League of Legends and tried to log in. I can't log in! I checked the servers and tried to recover my account. I can also log into the League of Legends website no problem! I checked the email to recover  my account, however, there another problem I need to solve! I checked my email and I have no email about recovering my username and password. I tried multiple times and I don't want to contact League of Legends just yet and have the hassle of following their complex instructions. I also checked the League servers, everything is perfect and works perfectly. I could easily log into League on my windows computer but I don't understand why it doesn't work. Any help or advice would be great, thanks.

replies.body: You may be having some network issues specifically connecting to our authentication servers.  Make sure that your launcher is on the correct region as a first step.  Then go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot your network.  Hopefully that does the trick!
Thanks a lot! I realized that I was downloading EUW (Europe west) and when I realized that I felt like an idiot! Next time I will certainly download the right one, NA (North America)
